sentences.en: an overpowering stench of rotting fish
Do I smell the revolting stench of self - esteem ?
sentences.cn: 我怎么感觉到这里有一些跃跃欲试的 自尊心 呢 ?
一切都是泥糊糊的,肮脏不堪.

sentences.en: I don't mind the heat, but it's the stench that I hate.
sentences.cn: 我并不介意天热, 却受不了这臭气.

sentences.en: I gagged on the stench of stale urine.
It's the stench of betrayal , the odor of that occursed sparda.
sentences.cn: 是那个背信弃义的人的味道, 那个讨厌sparda的气味.

sentences.en: The air was filled with the overpowering stench of decomposing vegetation.
sentences.cn: 空气中充满了令人难以忍受的腐烂植物的恶臭.

sentences.en: the sickening stench of burnt flesh
sentences.cn: 肉体燃烧所发出的令人作呕的恶臭

sentences.en: The stench caught in his lungs and he coughed again.
sentences.cn: 恶臭陷入他的肺部,他咳嗽了.

sentences.en: The stench from rotting food is stomach-churning.
sentences.cn: 腐烂食物散发的臭味让人反胃。

sentences.en: The stench from the sewer is indescribable.
sentences.cn: 下水道发出一股说不出的恶臭。

sentences.en: The stench of burning rubber was overpowering.
The stench of the rotten fish is fearful.
There was a strong stench of dead bodies.
Why don't you smoke your pipe a little to dispel the stench of his tobacco? "
sentences.cn: 请你抽一会烟斗罢,解解他的烟毒. ”
